unaware_value.description: The amount of music intensity generated when this enemy is nearby but unaware

attacking_value.description: The amount of music intensity generated when this enemy is in combat alertness

engaged_value.description: The amount of music intensity generated when this enemy is actively playing an ability

unaware_distance.description: The max distance for this enemy to be included in music intensity calculatiosn while it is unaware

attacking_distance.description: The max distance for this enemy to be included in music intensity calculatiosn while it is in combat

is_major_unit.description: [bool]If this unit is a big scary unit that triggers some specific RTPCs
